ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Song (parody): Closet Male
ygData.msgSnippet: Oops, forgot our norther neighbors the barbarians.  Yes, the blond is quite handsome.  And what s more, male newbie barbs wear less than female newbie barbs.
ygData.messageBody:
Oops, forgot our norther neighbors the barbarians. Yes, the blond is
quite
handsome. And what's more, male newbie barbs wear less than female newbie
barbs. Woohoo!

- *GASP* You forogt the Barbarians? Shame on you! If you like to "look"
try sitting in the bards guild in Kelethin. Perve all you want and look
like your really there to help =)

OK, I'll go hop in Lake Halas and calm down now.

- Sure Lake Halas ;) Might find a nice blonde in there, huh?

not a single smitten follower, Tunare

- It won't take long trust me :)

Jacana - Wood Elf Bard, Innoruuk, Leader of Jacana's Smitten Followers ;)



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
